description: Move over, smashed avo on toast. These fresh and flavoursome Mexican stuffed avocados are going to become your new favourite go-to breakfast.
name: Mexican Stuffed Avocados Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir coriander through salsa. Squeeze lime over avocado, then top each half with mince mixture, a dollop of sour cream, lettuce, cheese and extra coriander. Serve with salsa and extra lime wedges.
